requests.name: Create a resource server app
requests.description: Create a resource server app
requests.rawModeData:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomWebAppTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test Resource Server Application",
  "description": "Resource Server application for testing purposes",
  "isOAuthResource": true,
  "accessTokenExpiry": 3600,
  "refreshTokenExpiry": 604800,
  "allUrlSchemesAllowed": false,
  "audience": "https://api.rserver.com",
  "scopes": [
    {
      "value": "/mysettings",
      "fqs": "https://api.rserver.com/mysettings",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Get information about your preferences"
    },{
      "value": "/post",
      "fqs": "https://api.rserver.com/post",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Post on your behalf"
    },{
      "value": "/myprofile",
      "fqs": "https://api.rserver.com/myprofile",
      "requiresConsent": false,
      "description": "Access your profile information"
    }]
}

requests.description:

requests.name: Create a client and resource server app
requests.description: Create a client and resource server application
requests.rawModeData:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomWebAppTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test Client and Resource Server",
  "description": "Client and Resource server application for testing purposes",
  "clientType": "confidential",
  "isOAuthClient": true,
  "allowedGrants": ["authorization_code","client_credentials"],
  "redirectUris": ["https://www.mytestapp.com/callback"],
  "logoutUri": "https://www.mytestapp.com/logout",
  "postLogoutRedirectUris": ["https://www.mytestapp.com/"],
  "isOAuthResource": true,
  "accessTokenExpiry": 3600,
  "refreshTokenExpiry": 604800,
  "allUrlSchemesAllowed": false,
  "audience": "https://api.mytestapp.com",
  "scopes": [
    {
      "value": "/mysettings",
      "fqs": "https://api.mytestapp.com/mysettings",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Get information about your preferences"
    },{
      "value": "/post",
      "fqs": "https://api.mytestapp.com/post",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Post on your behalf"
    },{
      "value": "/myprofile",
      "fqs": "https://api.mytestapp.com/myprofile",
      "requiresConsent": false,
      "description": "Access your profile information"
    }]
}

requests.name: Search specific app (client id and client secret)
Search for apps with filters using POST
requests.description: Searching for the application details using POST
requests.rawModeData:
{
  "schemas": [ "urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:SearchRequest"],
  "attributes": ["displayName", "active"],
  "filter": "displayName co \"test\"",
  "sortBy": "displayName",
  "startIndex": 1,
  "count": 10
}

requests.name: Create a client app
requests.description: Create a client application
requests.rawModeData:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomWebAppTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test Client Application",
  "description": "Client application for testing purposes",
  "clientType": "confidential",
  "isOAuthClient": true,
  "allowedGrants": ["authorization_code"],
  "redirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/callback"],
  "logoutUri": "https://www.myapp.com/logout",
  "postLogoutRedirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/"]
}
